dcterms:creator: Takeru Miyato
Shin-ichi Maeda
Masanori Koyama
Shin Ishii
dcterms:description: A dataset used for image classification tasks, consisting of 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 different classes, with 6,000 images per class.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: Takeru Miyato
Shin-ichi Maeda
Masanori Koyama
Shin Ishii
dcterms:description: A dataset similar to CIFAR-10 but with 100 classes containing 600 images each, used for fine-grained image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-100

dcterms:creator: Hongyi Zhang
Moustapha Cisse
Yann N Dauphin
David Lopez-Paz
dcterms:description: A data augmentation technique that generates new training examples by creating linear combinations of existing examples and their labels.
dcterms:title: MixUp

dcterms:creator: David Berthelot
Nicholas Carlini
Ian Goodfellow
Nicolas Papernot
Avital Oliver
Colin Raffel
dcterms:description: A semi-supervised learning method that combines labeled and unlabeled data by guessing low-entropy labels for the unlabeled data and mixing them with labeled data.
dcterms:title: MixMatch

dcterms:creator: Takeru Miyato
Shin-ichi Maeda
Masanori Koyama
Shin Ishii
dcterms:description: A regularization method for supervised and semi-supervised learning that imposes local smoothness on the classifier by utilizing virtual adversarial perturbations.
dcterms:title: Virtual Adversarial Training (VAT)
